name: Maillayer
tagline: Email marketing without subscriptions
description: Self-hosted email marketing platform. One-time payment, no monthly fees.

name: Sidemail 2.0
tagline: All-in-one email platform for SaaS
description: Sidemail is all-in-one email delivery platform for startups. It has everything for delivering and managing emails ‚Äì email API, transactional emails, email marketing and automation, contact management, email templates, subscribe forms, and more. Perfect for teams & developers that want reliable deliverability without the bloat. We're based in the EU and GDPR compliant.

name: Pickle
tagline: Screenshot, redact, and share ‚Äî instantly and privately.
description: Download Pickle, the smart screenshot manager for macOS. Automatically organize, redact sensitive info, and share screenshots instantly. Privacy-first, built for Mac. Free download.

name: Soony Countdown
tagline: Count down to life‚Äôs important moments
description: Soony makes waiting exciting. Create beautiful countdowns for upcoming events, trips, launches, or goals ‚Äî all in one clean and minimal app. Add Notes, customize styles, and get smart reminders as your big moment approaches. Stay motivated, stay on track ‚Äî with Soony, every second counts.

name: WhatsDiff
tagline: CLI tool to help you understand changes in your dependencies
description: whatsdiff shows what actually changed after composer/npm update. See dependencies changes at a glance, risk-assess, and get aggregated changelogs without leaving your terminal. - Interactive TUI for reading changelog - JSON/Markdown output for automation. - CI/CD integration with exit codes. - MCP server to assist you with upgrades Your dependencies just became readable. Finally. Free & open-source.

name: Postbrew
tagline: The social laboratory for coffee lovers
description: Your coffee lab notebook meets taste diary meets social hangout. Log every brew variable, track experiments in journals, and watch your palate evolve in real-time. Follow fellow coffee nerds, steal brewing tricks, and geek out over what everyone's making. Unlike review sites (too commercial) or tracking apps (too mechanical), Postbrew treats coffee as creative practice. Think: Letterboxd for coffee. Independent & community-first. Just curious tasters nerding out intentionally.

name: Dispersed
tagline: Explore your public land
description: Finding quality camping on public lands shouldn't require hours of research. Dispersed makes it simple with comprehensive USFS, BLM, and NPS campground data, community reviews, GPS coordinates, and premium Hidden Gems from real campers.

name: BilberryDB
tagline: A No-Code Multimodal Vector Database
description: Build multimodal SOTA apps with lightning-fast embedding search across 3D models, images, videos, IoT sensor data, tabular data, audio, and text.

name: RewriteBar v2
tagline: Now With PopClip Integration, Followup Actions & Local AI
description: üöÄ Launching the next chapter of RewriteBar: the lightweight macOS menubar app that helps you write better ‚Äî now with PopClip support, on-device Apple Intelligence, local model compatibility & full workflow templates. Write anywhere. Better. Faster.

name: Kepler AI for Product Teams
tagline: See exactly how your team performs - fully automated for you
description: One place for managing product teams and seeing what‚Äôs happening on the ground üîé. View your team's skills and performance in real time, spot risks and opportunities, and know who‚Äôs the best fit for each project/job. Works with Slack (Jira/Teams soon).

name: Radiant
tagline: AI assistant for meetings that gets the work done
description: Radiant is your AI personal assistant for Mac that turns meetings into momentum. It captures discussions directly on your device and instantly drafts summaries, follow-ups, and updates for Gmail, Slack, or Linear. No prompts, no setup‚Äîjust accurate, ready-to-refine work that helps you move from meeting to execution in seconds. FREE in open beta.

name: Polym
tagline: Remember What You Learn
description: Polym is an audio app incorporating active learning for the retention of foundational knowledge, including statistics, logic, economics, AI, history, and more. The app utilizes retrieval practice, spaced repetition, and interleaving to enhance memorization.

name: Domain Stories - Big Domain Sales Tales
tagline: The fascinating stories behind huge domain acquisitions
description: Discover how startups like MemeLord, Somewhere, and Loom secured their perfect domains. Real stories from founders about high-stakes negotiations, trademark battles, and strategic plays. Paddle paid $275K then faced a cease & desist. Loom beat a $500K competing offer. Learn from their experiences. Browse featured stories, search our domain database, or submit your own acquisition story. Every domain has a tale worth telling. Now updated monthly with new stories!

name: OdjoAI
tagline: Find & contact hundreds of local customers in seconds
description: OdjoAI helps business owners find and connect with local customers - and manage every interaction in one place. It searches your area for potential clients, gathers insights, identifies key decision-makers, and crafts, sends and tracks tailored emails to start the conversation. From outreach to pipeline management, OdjoAI brings it all to one simple platform.

name: Snake
tagline: Play the retro snake game online for free
description: Play the classic mobile Snake game for free online. Eat the food but don‚Äôt hit the walls or your own tail!

name: FolderManifest
tagline: Declutter, verify, and trust your folders with one click
description: FolderManifest is a privacy-first desktop tool for auditing and organizing folders offline. Generate detailed folder trees, verify checksum manifests, and clean up duplicate or similar files ‚Äî all without uploading anything to the cloud. Perfect for creators, professionals, and anyone who wants faster, safer, and more transparent file management on Windows.

name: Toolbar - Bug Reports with AI
tagline: A simple way to report bugs that devs actually understand.
description: Capturing bug reports that devs actually understand is hard. Toolbar makes it simple. See a bug ‚Üí take a screenshot or record ‚Üí you‚Äôre done. Toolbar automatically captures the browser environment and every step that led to the issue, so engineers get the full story - no guessing, no ‚Äúcan you repro?‚Äù. All of this is powered by AI.

name: ResumeCustomizer
tagline: Generate Custom Resume with AI in just a few clicks
description: ResumeCustomizer helps you create high-quality, tailored resumes for every job you apply to ‚Äî in just minutes. The key is using relevant keywords, extracted from the job description‚Äî the exact ones Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) look for. This shows the recruiter that you are a good match for the job. Upload your current CV, paste the job description, and get a custom resume for that job! ATS Certified! Quick, easy, effective!

name: TypeCatch
tagline: Find and save fonts from any website
description: Introducing typecatch.com ‚Äî a free tool that helps you discover fonts from any website, no extension required. Built it over the weekend because I got tired of digging through css / reverse engineering inspo websites to find what fonts they use. LMK if you find it useful!

name: Ziny Proxy
tagline: Buy clean & reliable private proxy servers
description: Ziny Proxy offers over 30 million IPs across 195 countries. Unrestricted & Unlimited Residential proxy, Mobile proxy, and Static Residential IPs.
